name: Solitaire World Tour
description:
Enjoy the classic game of Solitaire in a brand new way. Challenge your friends for real-time multiplayer action, or take part in international Tournaments.

Travel to iconic destinations while advancing your Solitaire skills until you are ready to take on the best players in the world.

Play Solitaire World Tour today!

Exciting Features:

◆ Play multiplayer solitaire live
◆ Daily, All Time, Hall Of Fame Leader boards
◆ Exciting game play in cities across the world.
◆ Easy game to learn, yet challenging to master

Extra Features:

◆ Facebook connection so you can play with your friends!
◆ Cool rewards!
◆ Support on multiple devices and platforms!
◆ Play against players from around the world
